backend/main.mo: Empty canister actor with no behavior.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend static‑asset loading requirement tied to index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference summaries describing key frontend files, styles, Tailwind config, and App.tsx layout.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme tokens and dark‑mode variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting favicon, meta tags, root mount, and main script import.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React SPA with gallery, lightbox, booking scroll, WhatsApp link, and branding image usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that instantiates and refreshes an authenticated or anonymous backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder React Query hook that wires through actor but performs no real backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind theme variables for a premium gold/charcoal design with light/dark modes and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings using OKLCH tokens.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, branding guidelines, required images, known issues, and a list of feature specifications for a premium single‑page website for Nagpur Grand Food & Catering.
